sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们的球队取得了胜利。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen de qiúduì qǔdé le shènglì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre équipe a remporté la victoire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our team achieved victory.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 语言障碍阻碍了他们的交流。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yǔyán zhàng'ài zǔ'ài le tāmen de jiāoliú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La barrière linguistique a entravé leur communication.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The language barrier hindered their communication.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shāngdiàn wǎnshang jiǔ diǎn guānbì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le magasin ferme à neuf heures du soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The store closes at nine in the evening.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gāng nádào jiàshǐ zhízhào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il vient d'obtenir son permis de conduire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He just got his driver's license.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 诚实是一种基本的道德。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chéngshí shì yī zhǒng jīběn de dàodé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'honnêteté est une morale fondamentale.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Honesty is a basic moral value.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège wèntí yīzhí cúnzài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce problème a toujours existé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This problem has always existed.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nóngmín zài tián lǐ xīnkǔ gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les agriculteurs travaillent dur dans les champs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Farmers work hard in the fields.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùyào nàme zìsī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne sois pas si égoïste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't be so selfish.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zài zhèlǐ qiānzì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez signer ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please sign here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shǒujī de diànchí méi diàn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La batterie du téléphone est déchargée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The phone battery is dead.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zuò de shì xiǎo mǎimai.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait du petit commerce.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He does small business.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo lù hěn zhí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette route est très droite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This road is very straight.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们有充足的时间准备。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yǒu chōngzú de shíjiān zhǔnbèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons suffisamment de temps pour nous préparer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have sufficient time to prepare.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fángjiān zhuāngshì de hěn piàoliang.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La chambre est joliment décorée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The room is beautifully decorated.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ fājué tā biàn le hěn duō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai découvert qu'il avait beaucoup changé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I discovered that he has changed a lot.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 网友们对这部电影的评论很多。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǎngyǒumen duì zhè bù diànyǐng de pínglùn hěn duō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les internautes ont fait beaucoup de commentaires sur ce film.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Internet users have many comments on this movie.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè gēnběn bù shì wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est pas du tout un problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is not a problem at all.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǐlùn hé shíjiàn tóngyàng zhòngyào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La théorie et la pratique sont également importantes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Theory and practice are equally important.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de chéngjì fēicháng tūchū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses résultats sont exceptionnels.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His achievements are outstanding.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zǒngtǐ lái shuō, qíngkuàng hái búcuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dans l'ensemble, la situation n'est pas mauvaise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Overall, the situation is not bad.
